We are writing this document to assure you that no damages have been done. If such acts of trespass were to occur, we would bear all the losses you may incur and be able to continue to exercise this property without interruption. We would be able to settle all the disputes arising out of the said property due to the feuds and disputes at our own expense and continue to exercise the property in this document without interruption. We hereby grant you that the said property is undisputed and uncontested, and that we have the right of way from the Panchayat Road on the western side of the said property to the said property. We hereby grant you all the leasehold rights from the said place to the said property. The said property
number does not belong to the Sri Government's estate.

sections.content:
The property covered under Sale Deed No. 656 of 2015 dated 25/Feb/2015, executed by 1.Vungarla Rangamma , 2. Alla Adi Lakshmi  in favour of Bonam Mareswaramma, towards the property admeasuring an extent of 121 Sq. Yds. (or) 1089 Sq. Ft., Located Near by house number 3-98, comprised in survey number 101, situated in Korukollu Village Grama Panchayath, Kalidindi Mandal, Erst While Krishna Now within the District of Eluru registered at sub-registrar office Kaikalur  is bounded as follows:

North by: Site of Yerramsetti Rajamma
South by: Site of Chennamsetti Sitamma 
East by: Site of Chalamasetti Sri Ramakrishna 
West by: Panchayath Road

As per Registered Documents: 1. The property in survey number 101, situated in Korukollu measuring about 121 Sq. Yds. (or) 1089 Sq. Ft., was originally owned by 1.Vungarla Rangamma , 2. Alla Adi Lakshmi, who acquired the property through inheritance after demise of their parents. [Ref: Deed] 2. The aforementioned 1. Vungarla Rangamma, 2. Alla Adi Lakshmi, executed a Sale Deed on 25/Feb/2015, registered as document No. 656 of 2015, before the SRO Kaikalur in favour of Bonam Mareswaramma towards the property measuring 121 Sq. Yds. (or) 1089 Sq. Ft., Located Near by house no. 6-98, comprised in survey no. 101, situated at Korukollu. 3. The aforementioned Bonam Mareswaramma executed a Mortgage Deed on 10/Apr/2018, registered as document No. 1344 of 2018 before the SRO Kaikalur in favour of Manager Fullerton India Credit Company Limited Gudivada Branch Gudivada towards the property measuring 121 Sq. Yds. (or) 1089 Sq. Ft., situated in Korukollu , which was subsequently discharged vide Receipt Deed dated 23/Aug/2025 registered as document no. 8550 of 2025. (B) Additional Documents Supporting the Title : Note: It is to be noted that the HTR was not attached in this case, when the same is enquired with F.I., they reverted to release a conditional report. It is therefore advisable for F.I. to obtain HTR prior to the loan disbursement of the loan.
The mutation proceedings were not concluded in the name of the current owner, Bonam Mareswaramma.

contentList: Document Name * Document Description * Document Date * Document Type

Mortgage Deed* Mortgage Deed in favour of Vistaar Finance executed by Bonam Mareswaramma *---* Original

sections.content: We have reviewed the documents provided to us as per the F.I policy and have concluded that the Bonam Mareswaramma, possesses a clear, valid, and marketable title to  the property admeasuring an extent of 121 Sq. Yds. (or) 1089 Sq. Ft., Located Near by house number 3-98, comprised in survey number 101, situated in Korukollu Village Grama Panchayath, Kalidindi Mandal, Erst While Krishna Now within the District of Eluru registered at sub-registrar office Kaikalur.

Note: It is to be noted that the online EC has been verified using the key parameters, namely the Document Number, Survey Number/House Number, and Split Survey/House Number of the concerned SRO, as per the Deed. However, cross-verification across multiple SROs has not been carried out due to the AP portal’s requirement of separate passwords for each search parameter, and the OTP-based authentication mechanism makes searches across multiple SROs operationally infeasible.
